Stem: Bluish green, up to 1 m long and smooth or slightly covered in hairs, with yellow prickles.
Leaves: Undivided, irregularly toothed to lobed, spiny, up to 12 cm long.
Flowers: White to yellowish, up to 7 cm diameter.
FruitSeeds: Capsules up to 40 mm long, with many large, dark seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Lighter coloured flowers and more spines on capsules than American Poppy.
